name: SwordDelivery
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING! What to do

You are a blacksmith and you have to forge and deliver swords.
You have a nice cannon which you use to shoot yourself in the air and shoot the swords to the houses, who want a sword (marked with a flag on top).

Controls
  • use WASD and the mouse to move
  • near the anvil you can press the spacebar to forge a sword
  • near the cannon you can press the spacebar to get into the cannon, then you can adjust the height/power by pressing the spacebar again at the desired value
  • in the air you can hold down the left mousebutton to aim your shoot and release the left mousebutton to shoot the sword

best experience when played in fullscreen!

little exclaimer: this is a 3-day overscoped game jam game, so there are some bugs and unfinished things, I am really sorry about that.

Submission to Mini Jame Gam #11
